channel.title: Continued help with my server

item.title: Continued help with my server
item.dc:creator: @s0ul_reap3r s0ul reap3r
item.description:
@s0ul_reap3r wrote:

i have a couple questions. some one told me to change all my stuff in my .bat to this

@echo off
title pimpScape Server compile+restaRTer
tskill java /a
javac *.java
java -cp .;./jython.jar server

is that right and if so do i need to do anything to make my server run thank you for your help !!

Read full topic
